idea:
Hella Infratech Pvt ltd is a drone services company having a team of highly experienced aviation enthusiasts who design and manufacture various kind of unmanned aerial drones.

We specialize in autonomous data acquisition, real time data feeds with accurate survey and photogrammetric mapping services.

We are working with various government agencies such as Indian Railways, MSETCL and NHAI in providing state of the art drone services
name: HELLA INFRATECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
OUR COUNTRY HAS ALWAYS BEEN AN INDUSTRIOUS COUNTRY. PARTICULARLY LATELY WITH THE GOVERNMENT LED BY HONORABLE SHRI NARENDRA MODI COMING TO POWER, THERE HAS BEEN AN INDUSTRIAL EXPLOSION. THE THRUST OF THIS GOVERNMENT HAS BEEN TO MAKE INDIA A MANUFACTURING HUB FOR ALL GLOBAL ENGINEERING, CHEMICAL, SERVICE, AUTOMOBILE AND ALL SECTOR GIANT COMPANIES. THIS IN TURN WILL FUEL THE GROWTH OF ANCILLARY INDUSTRIES. MAHARASHTRA HAS ALWAYS BEEN ONE OF THE LEADING INDUSTRIALIZED STATES IN INDIA. THE STATE GOVERNMENT LED BY SHRI. DEVENDRAJI PHADANVIS HAS BEEN STRIVING TO MAKE MAHARASHTRA THE EASIEST PLACE TO START A BUSINESS.
IT HAS TAKEN VARIOUS MEASURES BY REDUCING PAPERWORK, REQUIRED PERMISSIONS AND ALSO BY GIVING PACKAGES TO STARTUPS. THIS HAS RESULTED IN COMING UP OF NEW UNITS IN ALL SECTORS AS WELL AS EXPANSIONS OF CURRENT PLAYERS. THIS HAS LED TO PHENOMENAL NUMBERS AND OUR PORTAL WISHES TO BRING ALL SUCH UNITS UNDER ONE UMBRELLA. BY BRINGING THESE UNITS TOGETHER WE AT LINKED INFOTECH WISH TO CONNECT PEOPLE FOR OPENING UP A WHOLE NEW WORLD OF OPPORTUNITIES, CUTTING COSTS, ADDING CUSTOMERS, SUPPLIERS AT THE CLICK OF A MOUSE.
 EVERY INDUSTRY IS CUSTOMER TO SOME AND VENDOR TO OTHER. OUR PORTAL WILL CONNECT THE SUPPLIER TO THE END USER. IT WILL ALSO FIND SUBSTITUTE PRODUCTS IN PROCESSES. THIS WILL ENHANCE THE DEMAND FOR THE PRODUCT. THE END USER WILL ALSO HAVE A CHOICE TO SEEK NEW SUPPLIER.
THERE WILL ALSO BE A LOGISTIC ANGLE CONNECTED WHICH WILL REDUCE COST AND TIME OF DELIVERY THERE BY IMPROVING MARGINS AND PROFITABILITY. THIS WILL HELP EVERY INDUSTRY TO GROW. THE GROWTH IN MANUFACTURING WILL CREATE A DEMAND FOR SERVICES WHICH WILL CREATE JOBS AND HELP REDUCE UNEMPLOYMENT. OUR PORTAL WILL ALSO HAVE VERTICAL DEDICATED TO JOB OPPORTUNITIES, SECTOR AND AREA WISE BY BRIDGING DEMAND AND TALENT POOL.
BY BRINGING ALL EXISTING AND NEW UNITS UNDER ONE ROOF, A HUGE DATABASE WILL BE GENERATED. THIS WILL HELP GOVERNMENT TO IDENTIFY UNREGISTERED BUSINESSES, AND WILL BRING THEM UNDER REGISTRATION. THIS WILL HELP GOVERNMENT TO GENERATE ADDITIONAL REVENUES BY WAY OF VARIOUS TAXES AT A LATER STAGE.
THIS PORTAL WILL ALSO BRING LENDERS AND BORROWERS CLOSER. BY PUBLISHING PERIODICAL UPDATES AND BULLETINS OUR PORTAL WILL SHOWCASE THE PRODUCT AND SERVICES OF SMALL UNITS WHICH OTHERWISE WOULD HAVE GONE UNNOTICED. OUR COMPANY WILL ALSO ARRANGE EXHIBITIONS AT VARIOUS LEVELS FOR INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTS, HANDICRAFTS, AND SERVICES WHERE ACTUAL BUYERS WILL MEET MANUFACTURERS AND SERVICE PROVIDERS. THIS IS HUGE TASK AND OPPORTUNITY NEEDS COOPERATION FROM BANK.
 WE LINKED INFOTECH WOULD LIKE TO INTRODUCE OURSELVES AS INDUSTRIAL SEARCH ENGINE OF INDIA. WE AIM TO BRING ALL INDUSTRIAL UNITS UNDER ONE UMBRELLA. THE PURPOSE OF BRINGING ALL THE UNITS UNDER ONE UMBRELLA IS TO IMPROVE EASE OF BUSINESS, CUT COSTS, IMPROVE MARGINS, HELP GENERATE EMPLOYMENT, THEREBY OVERALL PROSPERITY. OUR UNIQUE PORTAL WILL HELP USER TO GIVE DESIRED RESULTS. FOR EG. SORT IT BY PRODUCT NAME, COMPANY BY DISTRICT, STATE OR INDUSTRIAL ZONE, SECTOR, SUB SECTOR ETC.
name: Linked Infotech

idea:
M/S ADVENT CHEMBIO PVT LTD is a young company started by a team of professionals from the fine chemical industries with a combined experience of more than fifteen decades and we are rapidly expanding our footprints across the globe.
ADVENT CHEMBIO PVT LTD is a Navi Mumbai ( India ) based Chemicals Manufacturing Company and aspires to be a leading supplier of Analytical reagents, Fine & Specialty chemicals, Customized intermediates.
Our product portfolio includes a wide range of Fine & Specialty chemicals encompassing hosts of Inorganic salts, Analytical reagents ,HPLC grade solvents, GC grade solvents, Ion-pairing reagents, Electronic grade products, Research Chemicals etc. as well as variety of building blocks and advanced intermediates, the number of which is expanding with each passing day.
We have 2 manufacturing plants in Navi Mumbai (India) and a distribution network spread across the Globe.
In our website www.adventchembio.com you will get all the details of our products/ specification / COAs/ MSDS etc. and a link to our product catalogue is given below
Thanks and Regards
name: ADVENT CHEMBIO PRIVATE LIMITED
